trans-unit.source: Represents a panel that dynamically lays out its contents in a grid composed of rows and columns.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et panel dynamisk utformer innholdet i et rutenett som består av rader og kolonner.

trans-unit.source: The TableLayoutPanel control arranges its contents in a grid.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen TableLayoutPanel ordner innholdet i et rutenett.

trans-unit.source: Because the layout is performed both at design time and run time, it can change dynamically as the application environment changes.
trans-unit.target: Fordi oppsettet utføres både på Utform tid og kjøretid, den kan endre dynamisk som programmet miljøet endringene.

trans-unit.source: This gives the controls in the panel the ability to proportionally resize, so it can respond to changes such as the parent control resizing or text length changing due to localization.
trans-unit.target: Dette gir kontrollene i panelet muligheten til å endre størrelsen på proporsjonalt, slik at den kan svarer på endringer som overordnet kontroll endring eller endring av text-lengde på grunn av lokalisering.

trans-unit.source: Any Windows Forms control can be a child of the TableLayoutPanel control, including other instances of TableLayoutPanel.
trans-unit.target: Alle Windows Forms-kontrollen kan være underordnet kontrollens TableLayoutPanel, inkludert andre forekomster av TableLayoutPanel.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to construct sophisticated layouts that adapt to changes at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du ikke konstruere Avansert oppsett som tilpasses endringer under kjøring.

trans-unit.source: The TableLayoutPanel control can expand to accommodate new controls when they are added, depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen TableLayoutPanel kan utvide for å gi plass til nye kontroller når de legges, avhengig av verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> property to a value of 0 specifies that the TableLayoutPanel will be unbound in the corresponding direction.
trans-unit.target: Angi enten den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>egenskapen verdien 0 angir at TableLayoutPanel være ubundet i den tilsvarende retningen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also control the direction of expansion (horizontal or vertical) after the TableLayoutPanel control is full of child controls.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også kontrollere retningen på utvidelse (vannrett eller loddrett) når kontrollen TableLayoutPanel er full av underordnede kontroller.

trans-unit.source: By default, the TableLayoutPanel control expands downward by adding rows.
trans-unit.target: Som standard utvides TableLayoutPanel kontrollen nedover ved å legge til rader.

trans-unit.source: If you want rows and columns that behave differently from the default behavior, you can control the properties of rows and columns by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowStyles%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnStyles%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil rader og kolonner som fungerer på en standard virkemåte, kan du kontrollere egenskapene for rader og kolonner ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowStyles%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnStyles%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set the properties of rows or columns individually.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi egenskaper for rader eller kolonner enkeltvis.

trans-unit.source: The TableLayoutPanel control adds the following properties to its child controls: `Cell`, `Column`, `Row`, `ColumnSpan`, and `RowSpan`.
trans-unit.target: TableLayoutPanel kontrollen legger til følgende egenskaper i de underordnede kontrollene: `Cell`, `Column`, `Row`, `ColumnSpan`, og `RowSpan`.

trans-unit.source: You can merge cells in the TableLayoutPanel control by setting the `ColumnSpan` or `RowSpan` properties on a child control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan slå sammen celler i TableLayoutPanel-kontroll ved å angi den `ColumnSpan` eller `RowSpan` egenskaper på underordnede-kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To set the `Cell`, `Column`, `Row`, `ColumnSpan`, and `RowSpan` properties at run time, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetCellPosition%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumn%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumnSpan%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRowSpan%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Til å angi den `Cell`, `Column`, `Row`, `ColumnSpan`, og `RowSpan` egenskaper på kjøretidspunktet, bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetCellPosition%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumn%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumnSpan%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRowSpan%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRowSpan%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumnSpan%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumn%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetCellPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: > > To read the `Cell`, `Column`, `Row`, `ColumnSpan`, and `RowSpan` properties at run time, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetCellPosition%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnSpan%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowSpan%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: >> Til å lese den `Cell`, `Column`, `Row`, `ColumnSpan`, og `RowSpan` egenskaper på kjøretidspunktet, bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetCellPosition%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnSpan%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowSpan%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowSpan%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnSpan%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetCellPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The docking behavior of child controls is the same as other container controls.
trans-unit.target: Forankringsplasseringen virkemåten til underordnede kontroller er identisk med andre beholder-kontroller.

trans-unit.source: The anchoring behavior of child controls in a TableLayoutPanel differs from the behavior in other container controls.
trans-unit.target: Anchoring virkemåten til underordnede kontroller i en TableLayoutPanel er forskjellig fra virkemåten i andre beholder-kontroller.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the child control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles>, the control will be placed against the left or right border of the cell, at a distance that is the sum of the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A> property and the panel's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for den underordnede kontrollen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles>kontrollen vil bli plassert mot venstre eller høyre kant av cellen, med en avstand som er summen av kontrollens <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A>egenskapen og panelets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles> values are set, the control will be sized to the width of the cell, with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A> values taken into account.
trans-unit.target: Hvis både den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles>verdier er angitt, kontrollen skal skaleres til bredden på cellen, med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A>verdier tas med i betraktningen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles>

trans-unit.source: The behavior for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles> anchoring is analogous.
trans-unit.target: Virkemåten for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles>Forankring kan sammenlignes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Anchor and Dock Child Controls in a TableLayoutPanel Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [slik: ankeret og forankringen underordnede kontroller i en TableLayoutPanel kontroll](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If you need a child control to mimic the default anchoring behavior in other container controls, you can adjust the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A> properties to maintain a constant distance between the control's border and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger en underordnet kontroll å etterligne anchoring standardvirkemåten i andre beholderen kontroller, kan du justere den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A>Egenskaper for å beholde en konstant avstanden mellom kontrollens kantlinje og den cellen kantlinje.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the values of both the `Column` and `Row` properties of a child control to -1 will cause the control to be moved to the first empty cell in the TableLayoutPanel control.
trans-unit.target: Angi verdiene for både den `Column` og `Row` egenskaper for en underordnet kontroll til-1 vil føre til at kontrollen flyttes til den første tomme cellen i TableLayoutPanel kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The empty cell will be chosen in a search that proceeds from left to right and from top to bottom.
trans-unit.target: Den tomme cellen velges i et søk fortsetter fra venstre mot høyre og fra topp til bunn.

trans-unit.source: This order is dependent on the culture, so it will behave correctly in right-to-left (RTL) layouts.
trans-unit.target: Denne ordren er avhengig av kulturen, så fungerer det på riktig måte på høyre-mot-venstre (RTL) oppsett.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Only controls that have the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property set to `true` participate in the TableLayoutPanel control's layout computations.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Bare kontroller som har den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>-egenskapen satt til `true` delta i TableLayoutPanel kontrollens oppsettet beregninger.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also see: - [How to: Align and Stretch a Control in a TableLayoutPanel Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) - [How to: Span Rows and Columns in a TableLayoutPanel Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) - [How to: Edit Columns and Rows in a TableLayoutPanel Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) - [Walkthrough: Arranging Controls on Windows Forms Using a TableLayoutPanel](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)
trans-unit.target: Se også:- [slik: Juster og dra en kontroll i en TableLayoutPanel kontroll](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) - [slik: område rader og kolonner i en TableLayoutPanel kontroll](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) - [slik: Rediger kolonnene og radene i en TableLayoutPanel kontroll](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) - [gjennomgang: Ordne kontroller i Windows Forms ved hjelp av en TableLayoutPanel](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> properties to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>egenskapene til standardverdiene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.BorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style for the panel.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kantlinjestil for panelet.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> values describing the style of the border of the panel.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref> verdier som beskriver stilen på kantlinjen på panelet.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the cell borders.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir stilen for cellekantlinjer.

trans-unit.source: Setting this value will cause the panel to redraw itself and its contents.
trans-unit.target: Setter denne verdien, fører til Kontrollpanel for å tegne selve og innholdet.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellBorderStyle"></xref> values describing the style of all the cell borders in the table.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellBorderStyle"> </xref> verdier som beskriver stilen på alle kantlinjene i tabellen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellBorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellBorderStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the cell is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når cellen er trukket tilbake.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of columns in the table.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir antallet kolonner i tabellen.

trans-unit.source: You can specify both the ColumnCount and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> properties for layouts with a known and fixed number of cells.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi både antall kolonner og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>Egenskaper for oppsett med en kjent og fast antall celler.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also specify one property or the other if you expect the number of cells in your layout to grow, assuming that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> property allows for such growth.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi en egenskap eller en annen hvis forventet antall celler i oppsettet du kan øke, forutsatt at som den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>egenskapen gjør det mulig for denne veksten.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> is 0, the panel will grow by adding rows, and if the value of ColumnCount is 0, the panel will grow by adding columns.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>er 0, panelet skal utvides ved å legge til rader og hvis verdien for antall kolonner er 0, panelet skal utvides ved å legge til kolonner.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: Specifying panel growth with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> property is preferred to setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> or ColumnCount to 0, however.
trans-unit.target: Angir panelet veksten med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>egenskapen er foretrukne innstillingen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>eller antall kolonner til 0, imidlertid.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Controls can be added or deleted from the table using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A>property.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller kan legges til eller slette fra tabellen ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of columns in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Antall kolonner i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of column styles for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av kolonnen stiler for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the ColumnStyles property to access the style properties of specific columns.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen ColumnStyles tilgang stilegenskaper for spesifikke kolonner.

trans-unit.source: You can use members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> class to set the characteristics of individual columns in the table.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke medlemmer av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle>klassen for å angi egenskapene for enkelte kolonner i tabellen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control arranges its columns, it assigns priorities to each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>kontrollen ordner kolonnene, tilordne egenskaper til hver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle>i denne rekkefølgen: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: Columns with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType> are considered first, and their fixed widths are allocated.
trans-unit.target: Kolonner med <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle>satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>regnes først, og de faste breddene tildeles.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: Columns with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType> are sized to their contents.
trans-unit.target: Kolonner med <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle>satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>størrelse i innholdet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: Remaining space is divided among columns with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>.
trans-unit.target: Plass igjen er fordelt på kolonner med <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle>satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection"></xref> containing a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle"></xref> for each column in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection"> </xref> som inneholder en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle"> </xref> for hver kolonne i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of controls contained within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter samlingen av kontroller innenfor den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Controls property contains all of the controls associated with the table, including controls that may not be currently displayed because of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> limitations.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Kontroller inneholder alle kontrollene som er knyttet til tabellen, inkludert kontroller som for øyeblikket ikke vises fordi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>begrensningene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection"></xref> containing the controls associated with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection"> </xref> med kontroller tilknyttet gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the control collection for the control.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av kontrollsamling for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> assigned to the control.
trans-unit.target: En ny forekomst av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>tilordnet kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition"></xref> that represents the row and the column of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition"> </xref> som representerer raden og kolonnen til cellen.

trans-unit.source: A control contained within a cell.
trans-unit.target: En kontroll i en celle.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition"></xref> that represents the cell position.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition"> </xref> som representerer cellen posisjonen.

trans-unit.source: Returns the column position of the specified child control.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer kolonnen posisjonen for den angitte underordnede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If `control` spans two or more columns, the GetColumn method will return the lowest column index.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `control` områder to eller flere kolonner, GetColumn-metoden tilbakestiller laveste kolonneindeks.

trans-unit.source: The column position value is zero based, so you can use it as an index for the array returned by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnWidths%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Posisjonen kolonneverdi er nullbasert, så du kan bruke den som en indeks for matrisen som returneres av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnWidths%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnWidths%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `Column` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av den `Column` egenskapen der panelet legger til de underordnede kontrollene under utformingen.

trans-unit.source: To get the actual position of `control`, even when its position is determined by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Å hente den faktiske posisjonen til `control`, selv om plasseringen bestemmes av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>, kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>

trans-unit.source: A child control of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En underordnet kontroll av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The column position of the specified child control, or -1 if the position of control is determined by .
trans-unit.target: Kolonnen plassering for den angitte underordnede kontrollen eller -1 hvis posisjonen for control bestemmes av .

trans-unit.source: control is .
trans-unit.target: controlis .

trans-unit.source: control is not a type that can be arranged by this .
trans-unit.target: controler ikke en type som kan ordnes av dette .

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of columns spanned by the specified child control.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer antallet kolonner for den angitte underordnede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Column spanning is often useful for positioning a control that is considerably wider than its peers.
trans-unit.target: Kolonnen dekker er ofte nyttig for å plassere en kontroll som er betydelig større enn motpartene.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `ColumnSpan` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av den `ColumnSpan` egenskapen der panelet legger til de underordnede kontrollene under utformingen.

trans-unit.source: A child control of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En underordnet kontroll av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of columns spanned by the child control.
trans-unit.target: Antall kolonner for den underordnede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: Standard er 1.

trans-unit.source: Returns an array representing the widths, in pixels, of the columns in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en matrise som representerer bredden i piksler for kolonnene i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.Int32> that contains the widths, in pixels, of the columns in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av typen <xref:System.Int32>som inneholder breddene i piksler for kolonnene i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"> </xref>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Returns the child control occupying the specified position.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den underordnede kontrollen bruker den angitte posisjonen.

trans-unit.source: The column and row position values are zero based.
trans-unit.target: Kolonne- og posisjon verdiene er nullbasert.

trans-unit.source: The column position of the control to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Kolonneplasseringen av kontrollen skal hente.

trans-unit.source: The row position of the control to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Raden plasseringen av kontrollen skal hente.

trans-unit.source: The child control occupying the specified cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no control exists at the specified column and row, or if the control has its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible*> property set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den underordnede kontrollen bruker den angitte cellen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis det finnes ingen kontroll i angitte kolonner og rader, eller hvis kontrollen har den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible*>-egenskapen satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: Either column or row (or both) is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: Enten column eller row (eller begge) er mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition"></xref> that represents the row and the column of the cell that contains the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition"> </xref> som representerer raden og kolonnen i cellen som inneholder kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The GetPositionFromControl method returns the actual current position of `control`, even if its position is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetPositionFromControl returnerer den faktiske gjeldende posisjonen til `control`, selv om plasseringen bestemmes av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method takes into account the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control state, including column or row spanning and when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A> has placed a control with its `Column` and `Row` properties set to -1.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden tar hensyn til hele <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>kontrollen tilstand, inkludert kolonne eller rad dekker og når det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>har plassert en kontroll med den `Column` og `Row` egenskaper som er angitt til-1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: This is equivalent to the situation in which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A> return -1.
trans-unit.target: Dette er det samme situasjon som <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A>Returner-1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A>

trans-unit.source: A control contained within a cell.
trans-unit.target: En kontroll i en celle.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition"></xref> that represents the cell position.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition"> </xref> som representerer cellen posisjonen.

trans-unit.source: Returns the row position of the specified child control.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer rad-posisjonen for den angitte underordnede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If `control` spans two or more rows, the GetRow method will return the lowest row index.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `control` områder to eller flere rader, GetRow-metoden tilbakestiller laveste radindeks.

trans-unit.source: The row position value is zero based, so you can use it as an index for the array returned by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowHeights%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Posisjonen radverdien er nullbasert, så du kan bruke den som en indeks for matrisen som returneres av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowHeights%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowHeights%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `Row` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av den `Row` egenskapen der panelet legger til de underordnede kontrollene under utformingen.

trans-unit.source: To get the actual position of `control`, even when its position is determined by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Å hente den faktiske posisjonen til `control`, selv om plasseringen bestemmes av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>, kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>

trans-unit.source: A child control of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En underordnet kontroll av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The row position of control, or -1 if the position of control is determined by .
trans-unit.target: Posisjon for control , eller -1 hvis posisjonen for control bestemmes av .

trans-unit.source: control is .
trans-unit.target: controlis .

trans-unit.source: control is not a type that can be arranged by this .
trans-unit.target: controler ikke en type som kan ordnes av dette .

trans-unit.source: Returns an array representing the heights, in pixels, of the rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en matrise som representerer høyde, i piksler for radene i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.Int32> that contains the heights, in pixels, of the rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av typen <xref:System.Int32>som inneholder høyde, i piksler for radene i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"> </xref>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of rows spanned by the specified child control.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer antallet rader for den angitte underordnede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Row spanning is often useful for positioning a control that is considerably taller than its peers.
trans-unit.target: Raden dekker er ofte nyttig for å plassere en kontroll som er betydelig høyere enn motpartene.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `RowSpan` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av den `RowSpan` egenskapen der panelet legger til de underordnede kontrollene under utformingen.

trans-unit.source: A child control of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En underordnet kontroll av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of rows spanned by the child control.
trans-unit.target: Antall rader for den underordnede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: Standard er 1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"></xref> control should expand to accommodate new cells when all existing cells are occupied.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"> </xref> kontrollen skal utvides til å gi plass til nye celler når alle eksisterende celler er opptatt.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control expands downward by adding rows.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>kontrollen utvides nedover ved å legge til rader.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If an attempt is made to add a control to a full <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control, and the value of GrowStyle is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle>, then an <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis det er gjort et forsøk på å legge til en kontroll i en fullstendig <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>kontrollen, og verdien for GrowStyle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle>, og deretter en <xref:System.ArgumentException>forårsakes.</xref:System.ArgumentException> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle"></xref> indicating the growth scheme.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle"> </xref> som angir veksten-skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The property value is invalid for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapsverdien er ugyldig for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle"> </xref> opplisting.

trans-unit.source: Gets a cached instance of the panel's layout engine.
trans-unit.target: Henter en bufret forekomst av panelets oppsettet motoren.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine"></xref> for the panel's contents.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine"> </xref> for panelets innholdet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value representing the table layout settings.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som representerer innstillingene for oppsett for tabell.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings"></xref> containing the table layout settings.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings"> </xref> som inneholder innstillingene for oppsett for tabell.

trans-unit.source: The property value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, or an attempt was made to set <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings"></xref> directly, which is not supported; instead, set individual properties.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapsverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, eller et forsøk på å angi <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings"> </xref> direkte, som er ikke støttes, og angi i stedet enkelte egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: Receives a call when the cell should be refreshed.
trans-unit.target: Mottar et anrop når cellen som skal oppdateres.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutCellPaintEventArgs"></xref> that provides data for the event.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutCellPaintEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder data for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Paints the background of the panel.
trans-unit.target: Maler bakgrunn for panelet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the panel to paint.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om panelet skal males.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of rows in the table.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir antall rader i tabellen.

trans-unit.source: You can specify both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> and the RowCount properties for layouts with a known and fixed number of cells.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi både den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>og egenskapene RowCount for oppsett med en kjent og fast antall celler.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also specify one property or the other if you expect the number of cells in your layout to grow, assuming that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> property allows for such growth.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi en egenskap eller en annen hvis forventet antall celler i oppsettet du kan øke, forutsatt at som den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>egenskapen gjør det mulig for denne veksten.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value of RowCount is 0, the panel will grow by adding rows, and if the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> is 0, the panel will grow by adding columns.
trans-unit.target: Hvis RowCount verdien er 0, panelet skal utvides ved å legge til rader, og hvis verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>er 0, panelet skal utvides ved å legge til kolonner.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: Specifying panel growth with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> property is preferred to setting RowCount or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> to 0, however.
trans-unit.target: Angir panelet veksten med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>egenskapen er foretrukne innstillingen RowCount eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>til 0, imidlertid.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Controls can be added or deleted from the table using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller kan legges til eller slette fra tabellen ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Antall rader i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of row styles for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av radstiler for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the RowStyles property to access the style properties of specific rows.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen RowStyles tilgang stilegenskaper for bestemte rader.

trans-unit.source: You can use members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> class to set the characteristics of individual rows in the table.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke medlemmer av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle>klassen for å angi egenskapene for individuelle rader i tabellen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control arranges its rows, it assigns priorities to each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>kontrollen ordner radene, tilordne egenskaper til hver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle>i denne rekkefølgen: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: Rows with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType> are considered first, and their fixed heights are allocated.
trans-unit.target: Rader med <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle>satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>regnes først, og de faste høydene er tildelt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle>

trans-unit.source: Rows with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType> are sized to their contents.
trans-unit.target: Rader med <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle>satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>størrelse i innholdet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle>

trans-unit.source: Remaining space is divided among rows with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>.
trans-unit.target: Plass igjen er delt opp i rader med <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle>satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"></xref> containing a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> for each row in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"> </xref> som inneholder en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"> </xref> for hver rad i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Scales a control's location, size, padding and margin.
trans-unit.target: Skaleres kontrollens plassering, størrelse, utfylling og margin.

trans-unit.source: The height and width of the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: Høyden og bredden på kontrollens område.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
trans-unit.target: En av verdiene i <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> som angir grensene for kontrollen skal brukes når du definerer størrelsen og plasseringen.

trans-unit.source: Performs the work of scaling the entire panel and any child controls.
trans-unit.target: Utfører arbeidet fra skalering hele panelet og alle underordnede kontroller.

trans-unit.source: The ScaleCore method uses the `dx` and `dy` parameter values to scale both the height and width of the panel independently.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ScaleCore bruker den `dx` og `dy` parameterverdier som skal skaleres høyden og bredden på panelet uavhengig.

trans-unit.source: The ratio by which to scale the control horizontally.
trans-unit.target: Forholdet mellom som å skalere kontrollen vannrett.

trans-unit.source: The ratio by which to scale the control vertically
trans-unit.target: Forholdet mellom hurtigbuffertreff som å skalere kontrollen loddrett

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition"></xref> that represents the row and the column of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Angir den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition"> </xref> som representerer raden og kolonnen til cellen.

trans-unit.source: A control contained within a cell.
trans-unit.target: En kontroll i en celle.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition"></xref> that represents the row and the column of the cell.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition"> </xref> som representerer raden og kolonnen til cellen.

trans-unit.source: Sets the column position of the specified child control.
trans-unit.target: Angir kolonnen posisjonen for den angitte underordnede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The SetColumn method moves the control to another column in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden SetColumn flytter kontrollen til en annen kolonne i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: The columns and rows have zero-based indexes.
trans-unit.target: Kolonnene og radene har nullbasert indekser.

trans-unit.source: Setting the column position to -1 specifies that the control will flow to the first empty cell.
trans-unit.target: Angi Kolonneplasseringen til-1 angir at kontrollen skal flytes til den første tomme cellen.

trans-unit.source: This method reapplies the table layout to all controls in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden bruker på nytt tabelloppsettet for alle i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `Column` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av den `Column` egenskapen der panelet legger til de underordnede kontrollene under utformingen.

trans-unit.source: The control to move to another column.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen å flytte til en annen kolonne.

trans-unit.source: The column to which `control` will be moved.
trans-unit.target: Kolonnen som `control` vil bli flyttet.

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of columns spanned by the child control.
trans-unit.target: Angir antallet kolonner for den underordnede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Column spanning is often useful for positioning a control that is considerably wider than its peers.
trans-unit.target: Kolonnen dekker er ofte nyttig for å plassere en kontroll som er betydelig større enn motpartene.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `ColumnSpan` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av den `ColumnSpan` egenskapen der panelet legger til de underordnede kontrollene under utformingen.

trans-unit.source: A child control of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En underordnet kontroll av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of columns to span.
trans-unit.target: Antall kolonner som skal span.

trans-unit.source: value is less than 1.
trans-unit.target: valueer mindre enn 1.

trans-unit.source: Sets the row position of the specified child control.
trans-unit.target: Angir rad-posisjonen for den angitte underordnede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The SetRow method moves the control to another row in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden SetRow flytter kontrollen til en annen rad i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: The columns and rows have zero-based indexes.
trans-unit.target: Kolonnene og radene har nullbasert indekser.

trans-unit.source: Setting the row position to -1 specifies that the control will flow to the first empty cell.
trans-unit.target: Angi plasseringen rad til-1 angir at kontrollen skal flytes til den første tomme cellen.

trans-unit.source: This method reapplies the table layout to all controls in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden bruker på nytt tabelloppsettet for alle i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `Row` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av den `Row` egenskapen der panelet legger til de underordnede kontrollene under utformingen.

trans-unit.source: The control to move to another row.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen for å flytte til en annen rad.

trans-unit.source: The row to which `control` will be moved.
trans-unit.target: Raden som `control` vil bli flyttet.

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of rows spanned by the child control.
trans-unit.target: Angir hvor mange rader for den underordnede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Row spanning is often useful for positioning a control that is considerably taller than its peers.
trans-unit.target: Raden dekker er ofte nyttig for å plassere en kontroll som er betydelig høyere enn motpartene.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `RowSpan` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av den `RowSpan` egenskapen der panelet legger til de underordnede kontrollene under utformingen.

trans-unit.source: A child control of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En underordnet kontroll av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of rows to span.
trans-unit.target: Antall rader som skal span.

trans-unit.source: value is less than 1.
trans-unit.target: valueer mindre enn 1.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider.CanExtend%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: En beskrivelse for dette medlemmet under <xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider.CanExtend%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlemmet.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider>grensesnittet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to receive the extender properties.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>mottar egenskapene extender.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this object can provide extender properties to the specified object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis dette objektet har extender egenskapene til det angitte objektet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
